record.description: Liberty Loan posters are tacked on every available place in the German territory occupied by the American forces. The picture shows one of the pictures posted on the side of a large German wagon.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Separate sheet from War Department, Office of the Chief Signal Officer, Photographic Section, contains all captions, dates and locations, including captions, etc. for photos not in the collection.
